Text: @ shemyaza i have lots of rugby matches i need to upload them.i want to know is uploading rugby matches are legal or not?thanks for your torrents

thanks - and one question - sometimes, the matches download in two parts, i.e. '1 part VB' and '2 part VB' - if I change the name of the files (to the name of the match, obviously!), would that affect seeding?  if so, I won't do it - please advise, thanks!
